set_setting_desc: Neo-Tokyo, 2077. Chrome glints under neon skies, and the air crackles with static. Megacorporations rule with iron fists, and the streets are a concrete jungle filled with augmented thugs and rogue AI. Dive into the digital underbelly, jack into the matrix, and carve your legend in the neon-drenched ruins.

add_area.name: The Undercity Sewers
add_area.blurb: A labyrinth of rusted pipes and toxic sludge, home to mutated vermin and desperate outcasts.

add_area.name: Neo-Kyoto Markets
add_area.blurb: A chaotic sprawl of crowded stalls and flickering holo-ads, where anything can be bought or sold.

add_area.name: The Corporate Spire
add_area.blurb: The gleaming pinnacle of corporate power, guarded by elite security forces and advanced automated defenses.

add_monster_def.name: Mutant Rat
add_monster_def.description: A large, diseased rat with glowing green eyes.
add_monster_def.seen: A hulking rat with mange scurries into view.
add_monster_def.attack: The mutant rat bites, leaving a burning sensation!
add_monster_def.death: The mutant rat convulses and dies.

add_monster_def.name: Scrap Golem
add_monster_def.description: A lumbering automaton pieced together from scrap metal.
add_monster_def.seen: A hulking figure made of discarded metal shambles towards you.
add_monster_def.attack: The scrap golem smashes you with a metal fist!
add_monster_def.death: The scrap golem clatters to the ground, pieces scattering.

add_monster_def.name: Sludge Monster
add_monster_def.description: A sentient mass of toxic waste, capable of corrosive attacks.
add_monster_def.seen: A bubbling pile of viscous goo oozes from a drain.
add_monster_def.attack: The sludge monster engulfs you in corrosive slime!
add_monster_def.death: The sludge monster dissolves into a putrid puddle.

add_monster_def.name: Cyber-Scorpion
add_monster_def.description: A mechanical scorpion with a venomous stinger.
add_monster_def.seen: A metallic scorpion with glowing red optics advances.
add_monster_def.attack: The cyber-scorpion injects you with a potent neurotoxin!
add_monster_def.death: The cyber-scorpion's mechanical limbs seize up.

add_monster_def.name: Reaper Drone
add_monster_def.description: A hovering military drone armed with an energy weapon.
add_monster_def.seen: A sleek drone buzzes ominously overhead.
add_monster_def.attack: The reaper drone fires a searing energy bolt!
add_monster_def.death: The drone crashes to the ground in a shower of sparks.

add_monster_def.name: Street Samurai
add_monster_def.description: A street-level combatant with augmented reflexes and a blade.
add_monster_def.seen: A tough-looking individual with chrome arms approaches.
add_monster_def.attack: The street samurai slices at you with a gleaming blade!
add_monster_def.death: The street samurai stumbles back and collapses.

add_monster_def.name: Hacker
add_monster_def.description: A netrunner who can disrupt your systems with mental commands.
add_monster_def.seen: A person with glowing ocular implants stares intently at you.
add_monster_def.attack: The hacker assaults your mind with digital static!
add_monster_def.death: The hacker clutches their head and falls silent.

add_monster_def.name: Yakuza Enforcer
add_monster_def.description: A heavily augmented enforcer for the criminal underworld.
add_monster_def.seen: A hulking figure with a cybernetic arm and tattoos glares at you.
add_monster_def.attack: The yakuza enforcer lands a brutal punch!
add_monster_def.death: The enforcer slumps to the ground, defeated.

add_monster_def.name: Synth-Hound
add_monster_def.description: A cybernetically enhanced dog trained for combat and tracking.
add_monster_def.seen: A mechanical canine with glowing green eyes snarls.
add_monster_def.attack: The synth-hound lunges and bites with metallic jaws!
add_monster_def.death: The synth-hound's systems overload and fail.

add_monster_def.name: Geisha Assassin
add_monster_def.description: A deadly operative disguised as a traditional entertainer.
add_monster_def.seen: A graceful figure in a kimono turns, a hidden blade glinting.
add_monster_def.attack: The geisha assassin strikes with a poisoned dart!
add_monster_def.death: The geisha assassin falls, her disguise shattered.

add_monster_def.name: Security Droid
add_monster_def.description: A standard security unit designed to patrol corporate zones.
add_monster_def.seen: A patrol droid with a police light approaches.
add_monster_def.attack: The security droid fires a stun blast!
add_monster_def.death: The droid sparks and powers down.

add_monster_def.name: Corporate Mercenary
add_monster_def.description: A well-equipped soldier employed by the megacorps.
add_monster_def.seen: A heavily armed mercenary blocks your path.
add_monster_def.attack: The mercenary opens fire with their assault rifle!
add_monster_def.death: The mercenary falls, their armor riddled with holes.

add_monster_def.name: Tech-Priest
add_monster_def.description: A cybernetically enhanced priest who worships technology.
add_monster_def.seen: A robed figure with mechanical implants chanting arcane words.
add_monster_def.attack: The tech-priest hurls a bolt of holy fire!

add_monster_def.name: Cyber-Ninja
add_monster_def.description: A stealthy assassin enhanced with cybernetic augmentations.
add_monster_def.seen: A shadow detaches itself from the wall, blade in hand.
add_monster_def.attack: The cyber-ninja strikes with lightning speed!
add_monster_def.death: The ninja collapses, their cybernetics failing.

add_monster_def.name: Security Chief
add_monster_def.description: The hardened commander of a corporate security force.
add_monster_def.seen: A stern-faced individual in advanced armor directs their troops.
add_monster_def.attack: The chief fires a powerful energy weapon!

add_item_def.name: Reinforced Trousers
add_item_def.description: Durable pants with plating for extra protection.

add_item_def.name: Makeshift Helmet
add_item_def.description: A crude helmet fashioned from scrap metal.

add_item_def.name: Graffiti Jacket
add_item_def.description: A stylish jacket adorned with vibrant street art.

add_item_def.name: Utility Vest
add_item_def.description: A vest with many pockets for carrying essential gear.

add_item_def.name: Gloves of Dexterity
add_item_def.description: These gloves enhance your manual dexterity and grip.

add_item_def.name: Chameleon Cloak
add_item_def.description: A cloak that can partially blend with its surroundings.

add_item_def.name: Armored Kimono
add_item_def.description: A traditional kimono reinforced with light plating.

add_item_def.name: Tactical Visor
add_item_def.description: A visor that enhances your perception and targeting.

add_item_def.name: Power Gauntlets
add_item_def.description: Augmented gauntlets that increase striking power.

add_item_def.name: Datajack Boots
add_item_def.description: Boots with integrated data ports for quick access.

add_item_def.name: Ballistic Vest
add_item_def.description: A standard-issue vest offering protection against bullets.

add_item_def.name: Power Armor Helm
add_item_def.description: A heavy helmet providing significant head protection.

add_item_def.name: Reinforced Plating
add_item_def.description: Heavy plating that can be attached to existing armor.

add_item_def.name: Cybernetic Arm
add_item_def.description: A powerful robotic arm replacement.

add_item_def.name: Stealth Suit
add_item_def.description: A suit designed to minimize visibility and sound.

add_item_def.name: Pipe Wrench
add_item_def.description: A heavy wrench, useful for both repairs and blunt force.

add_item_def.name: Combat Knife
add_item_def.description: A sturdy knife designed for close-quarters combat.

add_item_def.name: Vibro-Blade
add_item_def.description: A blade that vibrates at high frequencies for enhanced cutting.

add_item_def.name: Shiv Launcher
add_item_def.description: A discreet device that fires sharp projectiles.

add_item_def.name: Makeshift SMG
add_item_def.description: A crude but effective automatic weapon.

add_item_def.name: Katana
add_item_def.description: A traditional Japanese sword, sharp and precise.

add_item_def.name: Extendable Baton
add_item_def.description: A collapsible baton used by law enforcement and security.

add_item_def.name: Shock Stick
add_item_def.description: A stick that delivers a painful electrical jolt.

add_item_def.name: Laser Pistol
add_item_def.description: A sidearm that fires concentrated beams of light.

add_item_def.name: Cyber-Revolver
add_item_def.description: A powerful handgun with enhanced cybernetic components.

add_item_def.name: Energy Sword
add_item_def.description: A blade charged with energy, capable of cutting through most materials.

add_item_def.name: Stun Baton
add_item_def.description: A baton designed to incapacitate targets with electric shocks.

add_item_def.name: Chainsaw Sword
add_item_def.description: A sword with a buzzing chainsaw blade.

add_item_def.name: Plasma Rifle
add_item_def.description: A high-tech rifle firing bolts of superheated plasma.

add_item_def.name: Railgun
add_item_def.description: A weapon that uses electromagnetic force to launch projectiles at extreme velocity.

add_item_def.name: Nutri-Paste
add_item_def.description: A bland but filling nutrient supplement.

add_item_def.name: Synth-Ration
add_item_def.description: A compact, highly processed meal replacement.

add_item_def.name: Fermented Sludge
add_item_def.description: A potent, foul-tasting drink derived from processed waste.

add_item_def.name: Synth-Sushi
add_item_def.description: Artificially created sushi, surprisingly tasty.

add_item_def.name: Ramen Pack
add_item_def.description: A quick-cooking noodle dish.

add_item_def.name: Energy Drink
add_item_def.description: A fizzy drink that temporarily boosts stamina.

add_item_def.name: Nutri-Bar
add_item_def.description: A dense bar packed with essential nutrients.

add_item_def.name: Stim-Pack
add_item_def.description: A powerful injection that temporarily enhances combat ability.

add_item_def.name: Synth-Steak
add_item_def.description: A laboratory-grown meat product, indistinguishable from the real thing.

set_boss.name: Cyber-Shogun
set_boss.description: The ruthless ruler of Neo-Kyoto, augmented with devastating cybernetics and a mastery of ancient combat techniques.
set_boss.intro_message: A chilling voice echoes, 'Intruder detected. Prepare for termination.'
attack_messages: A surge of electricity courses through you!
The Shogun's augmented limbs strike with blinding speed!
periodic_messages: The Cyber-Shogun's optical sensors glow menacingly.
'Your existence is a glitch,' the Shogun states emotionlessly.
The Shogun performs a swift, deadly kata.
set_boss.game_victory_paragraph: With the Cyber-Shogun defeated, the corporate grip on Neo-Kyoto begins to loosen. The future is uncertain, but a new dawn of freedom may be breaking.

add_character.name: Jax
add_character.backstory: A street-hardened cyber-runner, Jax grew up in the Undercity. Betrayed by his crew during a high-stakes data heist, he now seeks to reclaim his stolen cybernetics and exact revenge on the corporation that runs the Spire.

add_character.name: Kaito
add_character.backstory: A former corporate enforcer who witnessed too much corruption, Kaito abandoned his post. He now seeks to dismantle the megacorporations from the inside, using his intimate knowledge of their security systems.

add_character.name: Anya
add_character.backstory: A brilliant hacker with a mysterious past, Anya is searching for a legendary piece of lost technology hidden within the Corporate Spire. She believes it holds the key to unlocking true digital freedom.

add_character.name: Ryu
add_character.backstory: A ronin with a cybernetic arm and a burning desire for honor, Ryu was exiled from his dojo for using forbidden augmentation techniques. He wanders the neon streets, seeking worthy opponents and a chance to restore his name.

add_character.name: Silas
add_character.backstory: Once a respected member of a clandestine organization, Silas was framed for treason and forced into hiding. He now operates in the shadows, using his advanced cybernetics and stealth skills to uncover the conspiracy against him.
